snippet: Ignazio Marino had endured a political and media siege over the inefficiency and degradation of public services and a corruption scandal that left him unblemished but plagued several city officials.
abstract: Mayor Ignazio Marino of Rome resigns amid inquiry over his expense account; after being elected on reform platform, Marino had mixed record on his efforts to eradicate corruption and resolve city's civic dysfunction.
lead_paragraph: Ignazio Marino had endured a political and media siege over the inefficiency and degradation of public services and a corruption scandal that left him unblemished but plagued several city officials.

headline.main: Mayor of Rome Resigns Amid Expenses Scandal
headline.print_headline: Mayor of Rome Resigns Amid Expenses Scandal
